about_the_game:
The 13th Floor is a game that combines suspense and horror elements with observation challenges. Find yourself trapped in a cycle that spans up to the 13th floor, with each floor offering a unique blend of mystery and danger.

Gameplay

  • Your objective is to observe your surroundings carefully, searching differences that compare to the first floor. Be on high alert for anything that seems out of place or any entity that attempts to hinder your way to the 13th floor.
  • If you encounter such anomalies, head back to the elevator and report them to move on to the next floor; if you think you haven’t seen anything strange, hitting the elevator’s up button should do the trick.

    And remember! that any mistake you could cause the loop to restart, so be extra careful.

    Features

    • Variety : Over 40 unique anomalies and their variations await discover. Each one adds depth to your gameplay.
    • Entities : Beyond the anomalies, you will face entities that will try to block your path. Fighting them will constantly test your strategic thinking.
    • Replayability : The objects on the 1st floor may have different looks each time you start the game, making for a unique experience every time!

      13th Floor, is not just a game; it’s an experience that tests your perception and challenges your intellect. Will you break the loop and escape from nightmare, or will you remain ensnared within the hotel’s infinite loop?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain blood and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i7-6700HQ or AMD Ryzen 7 4800H or equivalents
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or Radeon RX 5700 or equivalents
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: You are stuck in an infinite loop within a hotel.Keenly observe your surroundings, report any anomalies, confront your fears, and escape the nightmare by reaching your room on the 13th floor.This journey tests your resolve and wits at every turn.
